name: Swallow the Sun
description: '''Swallow the Sun''' is a Finnish [[death-doom]] band founded in 2000 by Juha Raivio. Their [[death-doom]] style emphasizes melody and atmosphere, and occasionally steps into [[Gothic metal|gothic]] and [[black metal]] territory. They have released nine studio albums, one [[triple album]], one [[Extended play|EP]], one demo, one live album and seven singles.
